name: Cabinet Louis Reynaud
goal:
Cabinet Louis Reynaud is a Cabinet of technological, normative and regulatory expertise in the areas of digital security and cyber security and a Technology Evaluation Lab (Biometrics and Security) operating under the CLR Labs brand.

We support you in your digital transformation, especially in the evolution and evaluation of your products, solutions and services.

Our firm has offices in Provence/Cote d’Azur and in Brussels, close to the Telecom Valley (ETSI), the French SCS & Safe Clusters and the European institutions and the decision-making ecosystem.

Our Activities:

Our activities are developed around four complementary axes which are:

- Mastery of key technologies and processes of digital security,
- Mastery of normative and regulatory processes,
- Mastery of security and functional certification schemes,
- Owning its own Biometrics and Security evaluation laboratory.

Our services are based on four offers:

1) Technical expertise in the field of new technologies of digital trust
- Technical assistance and state of the art analysis
- Impact analysis on business plans,
- Specifications for new products and services,
- Go-to-Market Strategy,
- Secure integration of new technologies such as Big Data, Blockchain, Cloud Computing, Artificial Intelligence,
- Biometrics technologies.

2) Normative and regulatory watch in the following fields:
- Digital Identity and Cyber Security (eIDAS, NIS, Cyber Act, PSD II)
- Certification schemes (safe and functional),
- Data protection,
- Intelligent transport,
- Smart borders,
- Telecommunications,
- Single Digital market.

3) Functional and Security Certification:
- Management of security certifications C.S.P.N (first level certification from French ANSSI) on behalf of products manufacturers,
- Functional and / or security certifications schemes definition for private sectors (as for example within the framework of the "Cybersecurity Act" regulation).

4) CLR Labs : Biometrics and Security Lab :

We are able to make or identify Presentation Attack Instruments (PAI) and run performance evaluations on False Acceptation Rate (FAR) and False Rejection Rate (FRR)
​
We are proceeding the product evaluations against international standards :​

- Performances : ISO/IEC 19795 standards,

- Presentation Attack Detection : ISO/IEC 30107 standards.



- CLR Labs is able to design test plans on demand and make integrations of all biometrics and technologies embedding these biometrics.


Our laboratory, associated with our expertise, allows us to do:

Performance testing:

- Biometrics recognition engine (e.g. FAR/FRR)

- Liveness detection


Conformance and functionality testing:

- International standards

- API’s



Security testing:

- Template protection

- Algorithms integrity

- Secure application programming against side channel attacks


Test plan definition on demand



Test targets:

- Server,

- Computer,

- Smart phone,

- Smart card and secure element,

- Smart watch,

- IOT Devices,

- Automated boarding gates.


Ongoing application procedure for ISO/IEC 17025 accreditation process in France
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Communication, Digital economy and society, Migration and asylum, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives:
- Digital Identity and Cyber Security (eIDAS, NIS, Cyber Security Act, PSD II)
- Certification schemes (Safe & Security functional),
- Data protection (GPDR, ePrivacy),
- Intelligent transport (ITS, eCall),
- Smart borders,
- Telecommunications,
- Single Digital market.
